title: Test Login Functionality
description: As a QA engineer, I want to test the login functionality with various scenarios so that I can ensure the authentication system works correctly and securely for all user types.

acceptanceTests.description: Verify successful login with valid credentials displays user dashboard
Verify appropriate error message for incorrect username/password combinations
Verify validation messages when login fields are empty or incomplete
Verify user session remains active across browser refresh and navigation
Verify logout properly terminates session and redirects to login page
Verify rate limiting and account lockout after multiple failed attempts
